Akira Kawata

How to check the result

$ ./run.sh

How to update contents

  1. Update *.md files
  2. ./run.sh
  3. Add all files under _site directory
  4. Push

How to update Mastodon archive

$ python3 gen_markdown_from_mastodon_archive.py <PATH_TO_THE_ARCHIVE> mastodon_archive.md
